snippet.title: Eden's Edge - Doom Mode ALL! Clear
snippet.description:
Prequel time! As you can maybe guess, this is the prequel to Eden's Aegis.

Doom mode is a hidden difficulty that you can select by selecting the invisible option after Hell mode in the difficulty select screen. 
What they basically did with doom mode is that they took the hardest difficulty and made every single bullet like twice as fast. And unlike Hell where you had to no miss the entire game to see the TLB, in Doom you face him regardless.

Found out this was pretty doable once you learn the stages a bit. You really need all your resources for stage 5 though.

You can see me stall some things from time to time. This is actually to make the next sections more possible as you can kill the next wave of enemies during the screen clear of killing a big enemy. 
The stage 3 midboss in particular is a big juggle. You have to destroy all of its parts to get the 1-up and you have to wait to kill it right before it leaves the screen otherwise the next section will just swarm you.
